stateDiagram-v2
    [CloudNative_K8sCluster] --> Idle
    Idle --> Connecting: connect(CloudNative_K8sCluster)
    Connecting --> Connected: connection_ok(CloudNative_K8sCluster)
    Connecting --> Error: connection_error(CloudNative_HelmChart)
    Connected --> Authenticated: authenticate(CloudNative_HelmChart)
    Connected --> Error: auth_timeout(CloudNative_HelmChart)
    Authenticated --> Ready: init_complete(CloudNative_ServiceMesh)
    Authenticated --> Error: init_error(CloudNative_ServiceMesh)
    Ready --> Idle: disconnect(CloudNative_ServiceMesh)
    Error --> Idle: reset(CloudNative_Serverless)
    Ready --> Transmitting: send_data(CloudNative_K8sCluster)
    Transmitting --> Ready: transmission_complete(CloudNative_K8sCluster)
    Transmitting --> Error: transmission_error(CloudNative_HelmChart)
